channel.title: Red Faction Guerilla error
channel.description:
Ok, so, yesterday I purchased the THQ pack on Steam. After downloading and running the game, I attempt to start a new game, and it prompts me for the CD key. I enter the CD key steam provided me with... and I get an error and the game crashes...
(image temporarily removed)
Any suggestions?
If it helps, I'm running... - Windows XP SP3 - ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 - Intel Core2 Duo P8600 @ 2.40GHz 2.39GHz - 3GB RAM
Any questions, just ask, and I'll provide any additional info I can.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Red Faction Guerilla error
item.dc:creator: GoldenEyes
item.description:
Woopsie, yeah, I just realized that now. Wow I’m an idiot hahah. removes picture temporarily

Read full topic

item.title: Red Faction Guerilla error
item.dc:creator: IsolatedPurity
item.description:
Are your drivers all the way updated?

Possible Solution #1: (By Torinir from the Red Faction: Guerrilla forums)
Try forcing vsync through the Catalyst Control Center.

If you have XFire installed, make sure it’s not running.

Disabling Steam Community In Game may help as well.

Also your cdkey is in the SS, might wanna blur it out or something. Just to be safe .

Ond kaja:

Be glad you got that error. Red Faction Guerilla sucks.

You’re an idiot.

Read full topic

no, it doesn’t.
never had that problem under Win7, never played that game under XP.
